attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that you should have firing squads to kill all:

Child molesters
 
Paedophiles 

Murderers without a good motive eg: if someone broke into your house you could kill them

Rapists 

People who commit Sexual assault  

People who beat Woman 

People who beat Animals  

Terrorists

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
